full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI YANG 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA RGYAL PO'I KHABS 'BRING PA GUNG TSE DBANG NOR BU SOGS DANG, ,MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG YE SHES KYI PHO BRANG CHEN PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
